Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 5.51 x 2.2 inches; 4.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628157393'}
Review Text: This is super cute, you get three.  My only problem is it totally does not match my hair color.  This is used as a scrunchy you get three and it would allow you to have a fuller bun.. Its super nice how I would solve it is just to buy a hair color spray and spray it to match my hair color. When I do so I will post some pics as an update.  Its beautiful though I just can't use it because it does not match my hair color.
Review Title: I love these but
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Review Date: 2020/08/31
Store: Vedory
Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Review Text: Are you kidding me, you mean now I can wear lipstick again, you mean now I can breathe, you mean now I can talk without it sounding muffled, you mean now the mask does not stick on my lips. I am super happy with this, ladies it’s what you’ve been looking for and even better you can breathe better ❤️
Review Title: Wow
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Overall, this customer exhibits a holistic approach to beauty and self-care, blending practicality with a desire for aesthetics and personal expression.
